mapper.insert: insert into depositaccount(depositaccountcode, depositaccountbankname, depositaccountname, depositaccountrate, depositaccount_startday, depositaccountamount) values(#{depositAccountCode}, #{depositAccountBankName},#{depositAccountName}, #{depositAccountRate, jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{depositAccount_startday, jdbcType=DATE},#{depositAccountAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE})
mapper.select: select rownum rn, tbl.* from (select v.*, d.depositaccountname, d.depositaccount_startday from depositView v left join DEPOSITACCOUNT d on d.DEPOSITACCOUNTCODE=v.DEPOSITACCOUNTCODE where startbalance=endbalance and companycode=#{companyCode} order by day desc) tbl
mapper.insert: insert into deposit(deposit_companycode, deposit_day, deposit_depositaccountcode, deposittype, depositamount, depositbalance) values(#{deposit_companyCode}, #{deposit_day}, #{deposit_depositAccountCode}, #{depositType}, #{depositAmount}, #{depositBalance })
mapper.update: update depositaccount set depositaccountamount=#{depositAccountAmount, jdbcType=DOUBLE} where depositaccountcode=#{depositAccountCode}
mapper.select: select rownum rn, tbl.* from (select d.* from depositView v left join DEPOSITACCOUNT d on d.DEPOSITACCOUNTCODE=v.DEPOSITACCOUNTCODE where startbalance=endbalance and companycode=#{companyCode} order by depositaccount_startday asc) tbl
